title: What music do you guys listen to while you're playing?
body: Assuming you actually listen to music. I'm looking for something nice to listen to while I murder people :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CB3H05OhVDI
Pretty much the only thing i'm listening to at the moment

the cory in the house theme song...

or a cruel angel's thesis

I have always just left the game sound on, as playing with the sound off or obscured it an extremely large disadvantage.

Noticing you are lv15, you may want to keep that in mind as you advance into more competitive games. A lot of global abilities have sounds, like kled, sion ults, and being able to hear pings and abilities is very important, unless you want to get oneshot out of nowhere.
I have a youtube playlist with a bunch of songs from twenty one pilots, imagine dragons, coldplay, etc
I LISTEN TO THE GAME MUSIC ITS SO GOOD
